Title: Relates to penalties for violations relating to the sale of cigarettes and tobacco products
Summary: Relates to increasing penalties for certain violations relating to the sale of cigarettes and tobacco products; requires revocation of license to sell lottery tickets and revocation of a liquor license.
LawCode: Amd ยง1607, Tax L; amd ยง119, ABC L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to penalties for violations relating to the sale of cigarettes and tobacco products
